scripts.build: yarn workspace @hmcts/postgres-prisma run collate && mkdir -p dist && cp ../../libs/postgres-prisma/dist/schema.prisma dist/schema.prisma
scripts.start: npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./dist/schema.prisma && npx prisma studio --schema=./dist/schema.prisma --hostname 0.0.0.0 --browser none
scripts.migrate: yarn build && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./dist/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:dev: yarn build && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=./dist/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset: yarn build && npx prisma migrate reset --schema=./dist/schema.prisma
